member.name: M:WebSharper.DomJs.Dom.Offset(WebSharper.JavaScript.Dom.Element)
member.summary: Returns current coordinates of the element, relative to the document.

member.name: M:WebSharper.DomJs.Dom.Previous(WebSharper.JavaScript.Dom.Element)
member.summary: Gets previous sibling element of the HTMLElement.

member.name: M:WebSharper.DomJs.Dom.Next(WebSharper.JavaScript.Dom.Element)
member.summary: Gets following sibling element of the HTMLElement.

member.name: M:WebSharper.DomJs.Dom.Children(WebSharper.JavaScript.Dom.Element,System.String)
member.summary: Gets children elements of the html element.

member.name: M:WebSharper.DomJs.Dom.Parent(WebSharper.JavaScript.Dom.Element)
member.summary: Gets the parent of the html element.

member.name: M:WebSharper.DomJs.Dom.FindByClass(System.String)
member.summary: Finds HTMLElements that match given class name.

member.name: M:WebSharper.DomJs.Dom.FindByTagName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds HTMLElements that match given tag name.

member.name: M:WebSharper.DomJs.Dom.Find(System.String)
member.summary: Finds HTMLElements that match css pattern.
